action_items: 618 Recursion depth ≤ 7 Begin_again ready 1) Handshake · Contract (perfect opening) Goal Success criteria Constraints Scenario focus Tone enthusiastic calm technical playful Mode Deep-focus (1 artifact, polished) Rapid iteration (3 artifacts max) φ alignment Recursion depth Safety: max artifacts (rapid) Paradox (IF–THEN–BUT) Resolution (THEREFORE) Generate Opening Prompts (P0–P3) Copy All Prompts 2) Anchors · Begin_again Create anchor from current config List anchors Begin_again (restore latest) Export anchors Import anchors Tip: After the AI ships an artifact, click Create anchor, then ask for a refinement using the generated P3 prompt.
